channel.title: Cache loading 742: Black - Screen
channel.description:
This is clearly a common issue. Is there any way to speed up the cache loading when players first join so the black screen goes away faster? Cause for me, the cache obvious loads, but it loads in 2 minutes & I never get black screened at all.
EDIT: Is there a way to make the cache load as the game client is loading? Ex: Fetching updates, loading, etc.. So they don't think oh it doesn't work, and exit..?

item.title: Cache loading 742: Black - Screen
item.dc:creator: @jewystrength jewystrength
item.description:
@jewystrength wrote:

Its not a hardware and or network issue ^ I have been looking into this issue for a long time, it is because of the cache size but its also because there is no collaberation between the client, server and the cache download state. Someone needs to make sure when the client is ‘fetching updates’ its actually downloading the cache, if you login and there is a black screen press ‘`’ and type ‘displayfps’ it will show you the percent on the cache download.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache loading 742: Black - Screen
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Vinnyy, post:7, topic:540037”]I dont know what to do[/quote]I think it’s a hardware issue, unless if you can somehow compress the client’s cache more than Jagex did you wont be able to do much about this (minus perhaps loading a lower revision). Just make sure your players understand that they will need to wait OR buy a real computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache loading 742: Black - Screen
item.dc:creator: @Vinnyy Vinnyy
item.description:
@Vinnyy wrote:

I dont know what to do

Read full topic

item.title: Cache loading 742: Black - Screen
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Vinnyy, post:5, topic:540037”]Some people load the client & login and are fine. I’ve tried 2 clients “Rune-Elevation 718-742” & a “742 client” on Rune-Server. But even when with me, I join other servers & type displayfps the cache isn’t 100% and i log in and everything fine, I just don’t understand[/quote]It could be the new cache sizes, I doubt it’s going to be easy to load 2GB into memory.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache loading 742: Black - Screen
item.dc:creator: @Vinnyy Vinnyy
item.description:
@Vinnyy wrote:

Some people load the client & login and are fine. I’ve tried 2 clients “Rune-Elevation 718-742” & a “742 client” on Rune-Server. But even when with me, I join other servers & type displayfps the cache isn’t 100% and i log in and everything fine, I just don’t understand

Read full topic

item.title: Cache loading 742: Black - Screen
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

By default your client should load the cache on start-up… Try another client perhaps (assuming another 742 client exists).

Read full topic

item.title: Cache loading 742: Black - Screen
item.dc:creator: @Vinnyy Vinnyy
item.description:
@Vinnyy wrote:

When players run the client, it runs fine, the login page appears, they login. the page is stuck on “Loading please wait” (loading cache) It takes a while for some, so I wanted to know if there was a way to load the cache while the client is loading… idk

Read full topic

item.title: Cache loading 742: Black - Screen
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Do you mean there’s a delay between the window appearing and you running the file, that it opens and freezes until the cache is loaded or that your loading statuses dont work? Sort of hard to understand. If it works fine for you it’s probably a networking issue by the way.

Read full topic
